name: Bewko, Inc.
title: Business Owner
description: Managed a small mail-order business selling environemntally safe products.
responsibilities: Created the catalog and marketing material.
accomplishments: Started with nothing and closed up shop not owing anyone.
Sponsored trade trips to Russia and China to source new products.
learnings: The complexities of business in the real world.
reasonLeft: I wasn't making much money and didn't have capital to expand my marketing. At the time I didn't understand all the options to finance growth.
